column1: Specifications: "Your premium UniFi doorbell with an enhanced package detection camera and integrated display."
Programmable welcome display and secondary package-detection camera
Wirelessly connected with UniFi WiFi Auto-Link*
*Third-party WiFi configuration available during setup with the UniFi Protect mobile app."
"Weight": "Without mount: 253 g (8.9 oz)\nWith flat wall mount: 286 g (10.1 oz)\nWith 20° wedge mount: 325 g (11.5 oz)"
"Mount material": "Flat wall mount: aluminum alloy\n20° wedge mount: polycarbonate"
"Night mode": "Built-in IR LED illumination and IR cut filter"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-10 to 40º C (14 to 104º F)"
"Mobile app": "UniFi Protect iOS™: Version 1.5.8 and laterUniFi Protect Android™:  Version 1.4.8 and later"
